page.title: 04MEDIA-SOCIAL SURVEY
page.content: The majority of people seem to read the t abloid papers.These include "The Sun","Daily Mail","Daily Mirror","News of the World", and the "Express".The local paper "The Evening Leader" was very popular and so was the "Chester Chronicle". Papers such as the "Guardian" and the "Telegraph" were not so popular. Most people had a television and the most popular programmes were the soap operas such as "Coronation Street", "Dallas" and "Dynasty". Not many read books but those that do read mysteries,romances and any books with a good plot.Most women read"Woman", "Cosmopolitan" and "Woman's Own".Many people had the "Radio Times" or"T.V Times". People connected with the Church had religious magazines. Young children read comics such as the "Beano" or the "Dandy".
